rows.label: qev056401_MSG0001
rows.name:
Mmm... This matter is far too important to ignore.
It represents a serious problem for the Orphe as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0002
rows.name:
We Orphe will lend our skills to humankind.
In return, I ask that you assist us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev056401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask to hear more about the Orphe's problem.

rows.label: qev056401_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev056401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask what matter Tan'celeg is talking about.

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0003
rows.name:
It relates to the security of the Biahno water-purification
plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0004
rows.name:
There was an incident in which humans were attacked
on-site by cantors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0005
rows.name:
We Orphe have a plan to ensure that tragedy is
never repeated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0006
rows.name:
But it requires your kind to participate as well.
As it is a proposal that would benefit us both,
I hope we can work together to make it happen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0007
rows.name: The attack at the Biahno water-purification plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0008
rows.name:
Primordial creatures called cantors attacked a number
of humans working on-site there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0009
rows.name:
We Orphe have a plan to ensure that tragedy is
never repeated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0010
rows.name:
But it requires your kind to participate as well.
As it is a proposal that would benefit us both,
I hope we can work together to make it happen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_JNK0050
rows.name: Ask about Benefits

rows.label: qev056401_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask what the Orphe stand to gain.

rows.label: qev056401_JNK0060
rows.name: Ask about Plans

rows.label: qev056401_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Tan'celeg to explain his scheme.

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0013
rows.name:
I expect you are aware that we Orpheans require
senirapa water in order to reproduce?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0014
rows.name:
The process by which we manufacture that water relies
on the Biahno plant functioning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0015
rows.name:
We cannot allow it to be jeopardized by primordial
creatures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0016
rows.name:
So then, how to defend it? You humans are too few in
number, and I expect there is a limit to what can be
asked of your fellow BLADE operatives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0017
rows.name: Instead, we propose autosentries.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0018
rows.name:
We propose that autosentries be used to defend the
plant and surrounding area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0019
rows.name:
You humans are too few in number, and I expect there
is a limit to what can be asked of your fellow BLADE
operatives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0020
rows.name:
I assume you are aware that we require senirapa water
in order to reproduce?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0021
rows.name:
The process by which we manufacture that water relies
on the Biahno plant functioning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0022
rows.name:
We cannot allow it to be jeopardized by primordial
creatures, and believe this machine is the solution.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0023
rows.name: The autosentries will be unmanned and fully automatic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0024
rows.name:
They should be more than sufficient to defend both the
lake and the purification plant itself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0025
rows.name:
We are already hard at work on construction of a
prototype, but have come up short on a few parts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0026
rows.name:
I would like to ask you to procure the necessary
Ouroboros crystals and eradicator eyepieces
so we can complete our work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0027
rows.name:
You should be able to obtain both outside of New LA.
Your help is most appreciated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0028
rows.name:
We lack the parts necessary to build our prototype
autosentry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0029
rows.name:
Once we have those Ouroboros crystals
and eradicator eyepieces, it should be
simple work to complete its assembly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0030
rows.name:
You should be able to procure both outside of New LA.
Your help is most appreciated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0031
rows.name:
Work here is nearly complete.
Now we are just waiting on the parts I requested.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0032
rows.name:
How is your search progressing? Have you procured
the Ouroboros crystals and eradicator eyepieces?

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0033
rows.name:
Flawless work.
I see I found the right [ST:gender p1=man  p2=woman  ]for the job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0034
rows.name:
Once these are installed, we will be ready to begin
combat testing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0035
rows.name:
Your help would be most welcome with that phase too,
if you can spare the time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0036
rows.name:
The prototype autosentry has already been transported
to the Outfitters test hangar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0037
rows.name:
If you are able to assist us once again, please meet me
there after making any necessary preparations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0038
rows.name:
Thank you for coming.
I just finished making the final adjustments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0039
rows.name:
Well? What do you think?
Considering its role is defending a human facility,
I tried to cater the design to reflect human tastes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0040
rows.name:
Your people have a fondness for designs like this, no?
As such, I trust that you will like it as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev056401_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that you find it quite pleasing.

rows.label: qev056401_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev056401_SEL0041
rows.name: Blurt out that it looks weak.

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0041
rows.name:
Wonderful. Earlier designs crafted according to an
Orphean aesthetic standard ran into problems,
in that they tended to...terrify humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0042
rows.name: I am glad our adjustments were successful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0043
rows.name:
Though its easily accepted exterior is less important
than the cutting-edge Orphean technology inside.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0044
rows.name:
Hrmm. The nuances of your human sensibilities are
difficult to grasp.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0045
rows.name:
Regardless, the exterior is less important than the
cutting-edge Orphean technology inside.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0046
rows.name:
I urge you to bring total focus to this test.
A moment's inattention could lead to grave injury.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0047
rows.name:
Are you ready to begin?
The more combat data you can provide us, the better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0048
rows.name:
Thank you.
You have given us excellent data.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0049
rows.name:
We will use these results to improve on our design,
then deploy the autosentries en masse to Biahno Lake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0050
rows.name:
I am certain they will keep the water-purification plant
safe and clear of even the most ferocious primordial
creatures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0051
rows.name:
And as a result, we will have a steady supply of pure
water with which to synthesize senirapa water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0052
rows.name: That will allow us to steadily increase our numbers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0053
rows.name: All excellent news for us Orphe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0054
rows.name:
I had planned to run combat tests for the autosentry
in the Outfitters test hangar, but it seems someone
has beaten me to the space.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0055
rows.name: I was asked to wait until they are done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056401_MSG0056
rows.name: I see no alternative but to be patient.[ST:wait ]
